text: Keh dijiye kay Allah Taalaa ka hukum mano rasoolullah ki itaâ€™at kero phir bhi agar tum ney roo gardani ki to rasool kay zimmay to sirf wohi hai jo iss per lazim ker diya gaya hai aur tum per iss ki jawab dahee hai jo tum per rakha gaya hai hidayat to tumhen ussi waqt milay gi jab rasool ki ma-tehati kero. Suno rasool kay zimmay to sirf saaf tor per phoncha dena hai
